name: ExoBio
description:
An unidentified specimen.

An unprepared scientist.

An unexpected rush to survive.

Play as exobiologist Keane as they try to escape from a being brought forth via an extraterrestrial object. Navigate the science wing of the Spaceship Magnolia, trying to find the accessway for the rest of the ship. Avoid direct contact with the creature to stay alive!

Z/C to jump, X/V to interact with doors, terminals, and other objects.

Developed in Pico-8 in about a week for GB Jam 8!
